articles.author: Saurabh Sharma
articles.title: India's Maha Kumbh festival sees 15 million people take holy dip on first day - Reuters India
articles.description: Nearly 15 million Hindus, six times the number expected, took a dip in freezing waters seeking absolution of their sins on Monday, the first day of India's festival that could draw the world's largest single gathering of humanity.
